name: Climate Rush
description:
The world is in a dire state. Machines and oil-creatures are destroying the environment with toxic waste. Embark on an urgent mission to exterminate the source, with the help of hydropower.

Student game made in 5 weeks by:

  • Emil Johan Karlsen
  • Birgitte Marie Winterstø 
  • Karo Sunniva Tollefsen 
  • Thea Sofie Myrbråten
